desc: Founded by a pharmacist, Emogene & Co. is a women-owned natural skin care brand representing a well-defined approach to plant-based skincare: small batched, handmade, affordable and effective.

layout.text: Bridging the gap between science and nature to improve your skin’s health.
Our pharmacist-formulated skincare products were designed with one goal in mind: to nourish and improve the health of your skin.
